title: Garlic and sweet chilli king prawns with rounded basmati rice
ingredients: ['1 pinch sea salt', '360g basmati rice', '1 tablespoon cooking oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 small red chilli, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon soy sauce (optional)', '500g cooked and shelled king prawns', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '5 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', 'prawn crackers']
